Title: Hiring for Android Developer @ Digitas Mumbai
Description:
Company Description
Digitas is a marketing and technology agency blending insight and creativity to solve business problems. We work with many of the world’s best brands to help them define and execute their digital strategies. Our strength lies in our ability to, together diverse teams of digital experts to suit any brief we call it blending, and it’s the special sauce that makes our full service proposition supremely useful to our clients.
Across our network of 26 offices in 16 countries, we have 1800 digital experts delivering powerful and measurable ideas across communications, service design, branded content, technology innovation, mobile, CRM, digital media planning and buying, social media, EPR, and hosting. Our unique Dashboard product now underpins most of our big client relationships, putting measurement and ROI at the heart of our engagements.

Job Description
Digitas are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of native applications across industry sectors. Your primary focus will be the support and development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services.
You will be part of a team working alongside other project teams, QA engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential.
The role involves providing support for client events paid at overtime rates and in future may include an on-call rota for out of hours support and escalations.
Responsibilities:
Delivery:
Adopts a flexible approach to completing workload to ensure delivery within agreed timeframes
Work on bug fixes and improving app performance
Completes, and maintains, up-to-date, accurate and thorough documentation
Provide support and triage during client events which may include Out of Hours support
Ensures that technical fixes are implemented according to technical design and standards/best practices
Develops and applies knowledge of Android technologies on client projects
Unit tests code and delivers high quality work to agreed deadlines
Company:
Completes second level of certification in technology agreed with mentor
Communicates technical ideas and industry trends to colleagues through informal communication and formal presentations and training sessions
Endeavours to complete objectives identified with sponsor in CPR form
Mentors junior colleagues on an informal basis offering opinions and input in a supportive manner
Attends weekly technical meeting
Makes use of appropriate research materials (Internet, publications etc) to ensure skills and knowledge remain current
Maintains an up to date resume detailing client project experience
Maximises billable hours through making oneself available for client work. Makes best use of non-billable hours by working on internal initiatives, business development and self-development.
3. Qualifications and Experience
Has worked in software engineering/consultancy developing and supporting Android apps for at least 2 years
Has experience developing and supporting solutions involving a moderate to high degree of technical complexity
Degree in Software Engineering or Computer Science
Good knowledge of Java, Kotlin, Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
Knowledge of Git
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
Knowledge of Play Store and considerations of releasing apps to the public
Knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
Familiarity with the use of phone features, eg location, camera
Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
Passion for quality and attention to detail
Understanding of Google’s Android design principles and interface guidelines
Knowledge of Dependency Injection tools like Dagger2, Butterknife
Knowledge of Lambda expressions and Java 8 features
Familiarity with Continuous Integration tools eg Jenkins is a bonus
Good time-management skills
Good communication skills, verbal and written English and inter-personal skills

Qualifications

null

Additional Information

null

Title: Sr. Android Developer
Description:
We are looking for a qualified Android developer to join our app development team. You will be working with our engineers/ developers to develop and maintain high quality mobile application features. If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet you.
As a Sr. Android developer, you’ll collaborate with internal teams to develop functional mobile applications, while working in a fast-paced environment. Ultimately, you should be able to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.
What we are looking for:
Knowledge of Firebase, RealmDB
Knowledge of MVP / MVVM
Knowledge of Kotlin is good to have
Sound knowledge of Android Activity life-cycle and different applications.
Responsibilities:
1. Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
2. Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
3. Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
4. Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
5. Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
6. Design interfaces to improve user experience
7. Liaise with Product development team to plan new features
8. Ensure new and legacy applications meet quality standards
9. Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocols
10. Stay up-to-date with new technology trends
11. Design and build advanced applications for Android platform
12. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
13. Improving application performance, optimization for loading times
14. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
15. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services.
16. Design, build and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
17. Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
18. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
19. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
20. Experience consuming and/or designing REST APIs
21. Developing android mobile application by understanding the requirements given by clients.
22. Understanding the requirement specification for the product
23. Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform.
24. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
25. Developing, releasing, and maintaining Android Applications Required Experience, Skills and
Qualifications:
1. Proven work experience as a Mobile developer
2. Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Play Store
3. In-depth knowledge of Java/Kotlin
4. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
5. Familiarity with OOP design principles
6. Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
7. Ability to perform in a team environment
8. BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
9. Skills - Android, Android Studio, SDK, Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes, Kotlin.

Description:
Job Description
Location: Remote Working (Due to Covid) / Kerala/ Visit to UK
Travel Required: Travel to UK/EU to Customer site When required*
Will Train Applicant(s): Will Train Applicant(s) New technology
Interview SKYPE: Look4Services / Zoom
Job Summary:
Look4Services is a consulting company based out of UK and we are looking for creative minded Software Engineers and technical Developers with sound development experience in both PHP/ Python coding for MVC applications for e-Commerce. Several years of knowledge of PHP frameworks (Codeigniter**, Laravel ), LAMP with independent self-managed and proactive attitude. Previous experience in App Development on Android and IOS would be advantages
The Candidates career will grow with the company at a critical state of our product launch (www.stardealmedical.com) and extend its capability. Training will be given on advanced tools and opportunities for R&D in VR, IOT and Data Science. On-Site visit to UK may be required after Covid restrictions are removed
Roles and Responsibilities:
· Analysis existing code for its improvements.
· Designing and developing websites using PHP frameworks such as CodeIgniter and Laravel
· Develop using design patterns with maximum Reuse and clean code
· Good hands-on skills in Object Oriented Programming
· Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules
· Strong Integration development of RESTful Services and APIs
· Implementing appropriate Data algorithms
· Data Model and SQL Development in MySQL, SQLServer or MangoDB
· Integration of data storage solutions {{may include databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.}
· Performance tuning
Skills and Requirements:
· Experience and Strong knowledge of PHP web /MVC frameworks {{such as CodeIgniter, Laravel, Yii, etc ) and MySQL
· Understanding the fully synchronous behavior of PHP
· E-Commerce Design and process patterns
· Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
· Understanding accessibility and security compliance
· Development of CSS, JQueries and Reuse of Bootstrap and its customisation
· Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers
· Develop Microservices based on RESTFul services /APIs
· Strong knowledge of the common PHP or web server exploits and their solutions
· User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Additional Information:
· Self-Managed work style with proactive in team engagement
· Work with remote team members and coordinate development when required
· App and Unity Development skills is not mandatory but considered advantages

Title: Mobile App Developer
Description:
Job title: Mobile App Developer
With about 4,500 employees, Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited (STS) combines five units: Corporate Technology India, Functional Shared Services, Corporate Finance, Corporate Finance Audit, and Siemens Management Consulting.
Corporate Technology (CT) in India has over 3,000 professionals working in the area of software Research and Development. CT is a part of Siemens Corporate Technology, which is an innovation partner for the Siemens Divisions and shares a point of view in areas of strategic importance to Siemens, thereby ensuring its technological future.
This is your role. What part will you play?
You will be owning customer-facing components, mobile apps, as well as designing the best ways to communicate analytics & visualize data
You will be working with the latest Web and Mobile technologies: Typescript, Native Script, Ionic, Angular 7, Server-Side Rendering, NodeJS, PWA, Android and IOS.
You will be working on working on native applications
You will Learn, incorporate and utilize the newest technology in furthering the aim of the company and the product
We don’t need superheroes, just super minds
Qualification: BE / B.Tech / MCA / ME / M.Tech
You must have 5+ years of experience in Mobile development
You must have experience on Android, iOS and, JavaScript, React Native, React, Redux
Good to have - NodeJS, GraphQL, SQlite
Optional - Iconic & Angular
We’ve got quite a lot to offer. How about you?
This role is in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries – and the craft of things to come.
We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us craft tomorrow.

Organization: ADVANTA
Company: Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited
Experience Level: Experienced Professional
Job Type: Full-time

Description:
We are looking for a qualified Android developer to join our app development team. You will be working with our engineers/ developers to develop and maintain high quality mobile application features. If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet you.
As a Sr. Android developer, you’ll collaborate with internal teams to develop functional mobile applications, while working in a fast-paced environment. Ultimately, you should be able to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.
What we are looking for:
Knowledge of Firebase, RealmDB
Knowledge of MVP / MVVM
Knowledge of Kotlin is good to have
Sound knowledge of Android Activity life-cycle and different applications.
Responsibilities:
1. Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
2. Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
3. Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
4. Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
5. Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
6. Design interfaces to improve user experience
7. Liaise with Product development team to plan new features

18. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
19. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
20. Experience consuming and/or designing REST APIs
21. Developing android mobile application by understanding the requirements given by clients.
22. Understanding the requirement specification for the product
23. Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform.
24. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
25. Developing, releasing, and maintaining Android Applications Required Experience, Skills and
Qualifications:
1. Proven work experience as a Mobile developer
2. Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Play Store
3. In-depth knowledge of Java/Kotlin
4. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs

9. Skills - Android, Android Studio, SDK, Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes, Kotlin.

Title: Software QA Engineer
Description:
Software QA Engineer
Making the invisible visible. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, we’re advancing the practice of medicine for doctors and society. And we’re just getting warmed up.
AliveCor, the creator of the smartphone ECG, which has now captured over 20 million ECGs from tens of thousands of active users, seeks a SQA Engineer. The Software QA engineer will directly contribute to existing products, testing software for our Web, iOS, and Android products. You will be a key player in developing highly-visible, customer-facing products that are transforming the healthcare industry via big data.

Responsibilities
Be responsible for the testing of all mobile applications.
Report and verify bugs in a timely manner.
Work with developers, product and other team members to develop test plans and cases to mitigate risk.
Document test cases for regulatory purposes.
Promote a culture of quality throughout the organization.
Work with Engineering and Product Management teams to identify high-impact issues.
Use defect tracking tools to log, track and refine issues.
Perform functional testing of new features as they are developed.
Participate in all aspects of QA product lifecycle: understand the product requirements, test case creation, feature, regression, integration, end-to-end test execution.
Prepare and review test plans and cases with extended development and product management teams.

Qualifications and Skills
B.E in Computer Science or a related discipline, or related practical experience.
3-8 years of relevant QA experience.
Proven work experience in Mobile Apps Testing for Android and iOS.
Proven work experience in modern web-based applications testing.
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes.
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing.
Knowledge of automated testing tools will be an added advantage.
Excellent programming skills in one of the following - Ruby, Python, Go, Objective C, or Java

About Us
AliveCor is on a mission to define modern healthcare through data, design and disruption. We’ve pioneered the creation of FDA-cleared machine-learning techniques, transformed wearable medtech to put proactive heart care at everyone’s fingertips. Kardia is the most clinically validated mobile EKG technology. AliveCor was named as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Health for 2017 by Fast Company as part of the publication’s annual ranking of the world’s Most Innovative Companies. AliveCor was awarded the 2015 Tech Pioneer by the World Economic Forum and one of the 50 Smartest Companies in 2015 by the MIT Technology Review. AliveCor recently announced a collaboration with Mayo Clinic that will result in new machine learning capabilities to unlock previously hidden health indicators in EKG data, potentially improving heart health as well as overall health care for a variety of conditions. AliveCor is a privately held company headquartered in Mountain View, CA.
AliveCor is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of age, colour, disability, gender, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation, or any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.
Watch the following video demonstrating our product.
KardiaMobile: How's your heart?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8I9xosgA-Ig

Title: Hiring for Android Developer @ Digitas Mumbai
Description:
Company Description
Digitas is a marketing and technology agency blending insight and creativity to solve business problems. We work with many of the world’s best brands to help them define and execute their digital strategies. Our strength lies in our ability to, together diverse teams of digital experts to suit any brief we call it blending, and it’s the special sauce that makes our full service proposition supremely useful to our clients.
Across our network of 26 offices in 16 countries, we have 1800 digital experts delivering powerful and measurable ideas across communications, service design, branded content, technology innovation, mobile, CRM, digital media planning and buying, social media, EPR, and hosting. Our unique Dashboard product now underpins most of our big client relationships, putting measurement and ROI at the heart of our engagements.

Job Description
Digitas are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of native applications across industry sectors. Your primary focus will be the support and development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services.
You will be part of a team working alongside other project teams, QA engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential.
The role involves providing support for client events paid at overtime rates and in future may include an on-call rota for out of hours support and escalations.
Responsibilities:
Delivery:
Adopts a flexible approach to completing workload to ensure delivery within agreed timeframes
Work on bug fixes and improving app performance
Completes, and maintains, up-to-date, accurate and thorough documentation
Provide support and triage during client events which may include Out of Hours support
Ensures that technical fixes are implemented according to technical design and standards/best practices
Develops and applies knowledge of Android technologies on client projects
Unit tests code and delivers high quality work to agreed deadlines
Company:
Completes second level of certification in technology agreed with mentor
Communicates technical ideas and industry trends to colleagues through informal communication and formal presentations and training sessions
Endeavours to complete objectives identified with sponsor in CPR form
Mentors junior colleagues on an informal basis offering opinions and input in a supportive manner
Attends weekly technical meeting
Makes use of appropriate research materials (Internet, publications etc) to ensure skills and knowledge remain current
Maintains an up to date resume detailing client project experience
Maximises billable hours through making oneself available for client work. Makes best use of non-billable hours by working on internal initiatives, business development and self-development.
3. Qualifications and Experience
Has worked in software engineering/consultancy developing and supporting Android apps for at least 2 years
Has experience developing and supporting solutions involving a moderate to high degree of technical complexity
Degree in Software Engineering or Computer Science
Good knowledge of Java, Kotlin, Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes

Knowledge of Lambda expressions and Java 8 features
Familiarity with Continuous Integration tools eg Jenkins is a bonus
Good time-management skills
Good communication skills, verbal and written English and inter-personal skills

Title: Software QA Engineer
Description:
Software QA Engineer
Making the invisible visible. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, we’re advancing the practice of medicine for doctors and society. And we’re just getting warmed up.
AliveCor, the creator of the smartphone ECG, which has now captured over 20 million ECGs from tens of thousands of active users, seeks a SQA Engineer. The Software QA engineer will directly contribute to existing products, testing software for our Web, iOS, and Android products. You will be a key player in developing highly-visible, customer-facing products that are transforming the healthcare industry via big data.

Responsibilities
Be responsible for the testing of all mobile applications.
Report and verify bugs in a timely manner.
Work with developers, product and other team members to develop test plans and cases to mitigate risk.
Document test cases for regulatory purposes.
Promote a culture of quality throughout the organization.
Work with Engineering and Product Management teams to identify high-impact issues.
Use defect tracking tools to log, track and refine issues.
Perform functional testing of new features as they are developed.
Participate in all aspects of QA product lifecycle: understand the product requirements, test case creation, feature, regression, integration, end-to-end test execution.
Prepare and review test plans and cases with extended development and product management teams.

Qualifications and Skills
B.E in Computer Science or a related discipline, or related practical experience.
3-8 years of relevant QA experience.
Proven work experience in Mobile Apps Testing for Android and iOS.
Proven work experience in modern web-based applications testing.
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes.
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing.
Knowledge of automated testing tools will be an added advantage.
Excellent programming skills in one of the following - Ruby, Python, Go, Objective C, or Java

About Us
AliveCor is on a mission to define modern healthcare through data, design and disruption. We’ve pioneered the creation of FDA-cleared machine-learning techniques, transformed wearable medtech to put proactive heart care at everyone’s fingertips. Kardia is the most clinically validated mobile EKG technology. AliveCor was named as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Health for 2017 by Fast Company as part of the publication’s annual ranking of the world’s Most Innovative Companies. AliveCor was awarded the 2015 Tech Pioneer by the World Economic Forum and one of the 50 Smartest Companies in 2015 by the MIT Technology Review. AliveCor recently announced a collaboration with Mayo Clinic that will result in new machine learning capabilities to unlock previously hidden health indicators in EKG data, potentially improving heart health as well as overall health care for a variety of conditions. AliveCor is a privately held company headquartered in Mountain View, CA.
AliveCor is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of age, colour, disability, gender, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation, or any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.
Watch the following video demonstrating our product.
KardiaMobile: How's your heart?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8I9xosgA-Ig

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer I
Description:
1+ year of experience working as a Quality Assurance Engineer
Experience in manual testing
Experience in automation testing
Bachelor's Degree
Experience in manual testing and automation testing
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field or equivalent work experience.
3+ years of test engineering experience.
Understanding of QA processes and concepts including test plan, test case preparation, and testing methodologies, agile a plus.
Demonstrated knowledge of professional software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control, build and release processes, continuous deployment, and test suite development and maintenance.
Define test plans, test suites, test cases as well as utilize automated tools to optimize the STLC.
Experience in Core Java, Python, JavaScript scripting and user-level test automation.
Hands-on experience with automated testing tools like Selenium, Appium for android and iOS.

Amazon's Ring is looking for is looking for high-energy, detail-oriented, and technically-savvy Quality Assurance Engineers to perform quality assurance testing. QAEs at Amazon are excellent individual contributors capable of understanding business requirements and converting them to QA understandable testcases, driving test execution, capturing errors and automating those test cases. QAEs would be trying to understand application performance, functionality, features to great depth which would enable them to report issues and also take ownership in automating the repetitive tasks. QAEs are highly accurate in performing application tests, reporting the behavior ensuring that there is no ambiguity while reproducing issues. High quality and accuracy is maintained throughout the application release without compromising on deadlines.

Role Responsibilities:
As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will:
Work closely with engineers and business owners throughout the development and testing life cycle, review requirements, specifications and technical design documents
Drive the creation of test plans and test cases, efficiently execute test cases across all functional and UI areas of our products
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools
Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs
Collaborate with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
Monitor debugging process results

About Ring
Since its founding in 2013, Ring has been on a mission to make neighborhoods safer. From the video doorbell, to Ring Alarm, which was named #1 in Customer Satisfaction for DIY Home Security Systems by J.D. Power, Ring’s smart home security product line, as well as the Neighbors app, offer users affordable whole-home and neighborhood security. At Ring, we are committed to making home and neighborhood security accessible and effective for everyone - while working hard to bring communities together. Ring is an Amazon company. For more information, visit www.ring.com. With Ring, you’re always home.
Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please visit https://www.amazon.jobs/en/disability/us//.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills, especially excellence in technical communications with peers who may be remote.
Good knowledge of software QA methodologies, automation tools and processes
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
Shows creativity and initiative to improve product test coverage and effectiveness.
Experience working in an agile/scrum development process
Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus

Title: Android Application Developer
Description:
*Job Description: *
Agnik is a global connected car technology company operating in 200+ countries headquartered in USA with major consumer brands like Vyncs (www.vyncs.com) and several B2B products. Agnik is looking for several full-time members to join the Technical Team at its New Town, Kolkata office under the rank of Android App Developer. If you want to join a top notch connected car applications development team and have at least two years of hands on experience in Android app development with a passion for creating a top-notch user experience, then send a copy of your complete resume with a subject line “Android App Developer”.
Responsibilities and Duties: *
The primary responsibility of this position is to maintain existing apps, adding new features, and creating new apps. The selected person will be accountable for app development responsibilities including both backend (SDK) and user interface development. Additionally, they will have to work alongside the user interface/user experience design team in order to ensure that all existing and new applications are state-of-the-art, professional, and functional in terms of interface and user experience. The successful candidate will be knowledgeable and passionate about latest developments in Android application software technologies and should be a hands-on developer.
*Android App Developer duties include: *
Develop Android mobile applications.
Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform.
Designing and developing user interfaces. Collaborate with the UI/UX design team for creating the graphic elements.
Writing and reviewing code using the Java programming language.
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
Data management using relational and non-relational data management systems.
Familiarity with authentication and encryption technology.
Qualifications and Skills
The Android App Developer position requires:
At least a B.Tech/BS degree from a reputed University in Computer Science or a related discipline.
Experience in building Android applications.
An eye for creating beautiful user interfaces.
Ability to communicate in English. Effective communication skills and interpersonal skills, both orally and in written form.
Ability to juggle multiple projects simultaneously.
Attention to detail, ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.

Title: Sr. Android Developer
Description:
We are looking for a qualified Android developer to join our app development team. You will be working with our engineers/ developers to develop and maintain high quality mobile application features. If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet you.
As a Sr. Android developer, you’ll collaborate with internal teams to develop functional mobile applications, while working in a fast-paced environment. Ultimately, you should be able to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.
What we are looking for:
Knowledge of Firebase, RealmDB
Knowledge of MVP / MVVM
Knowledge of Kotlin is good to have
Sound knowledge of Android Activity life-cycle and different applications.
Responsibilities:
1. Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
2. Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
3. Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
4. Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
5. Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
6. Design interfaces to improve user experience
7. Liaise with Product development team to plan new features
8. Ensure new and legacy applications meet quality standards
9. Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocols
10. Stay up-to-date with new technology trends
11. Design and build advanced applications for Android platform
12. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
13. Improving application performance, optimization for loading times
14. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
15. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services.
16. Design, build and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
17. Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
18. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
19. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
20. Experience consuming and/or designing REST APIs
21. Developing android mobile application by understanding the requirements given by clients.
22. Understanding the requirement specification for the product
23. Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform.
24. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
25. Developing, releasing, and maintaining Android Applications Required Experience, Skills and
Qualifications:
1. Proven work experience as a Mobile developer
2. Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Play Store
3. In-depth knowledge of Java/Kotlin
4. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
5. Familiarity with OOP design principles
6. Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
7. Ability to perform in a team environment
8. BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
9. Skills - Android, Android Studio, SDK, Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes, Kotlin.

Title: Mobile App Developer
Description:
Job title: Mobile App Developer
With about 4,500 employees, Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited (STS) combines five units: Corporate Technology India, Functional Shared Services, Corporate Finance, Corporate Finance Audit, and Siemens Management Consulting.
Corporate Technology (CT) in India has over 3,000 professionals working in the area of software Research and Development. CT is a part of Siemens Corporate Technology, which is an innovation partner for the Siemens Divisions and shares a point of view in areas of strategic importance to Siemens, thereby ensuring its technological future.
This is your role. What part will you play?
You will be owning customer-facing components, mobile apps, as well as designing the best ways to communicate analytics & visualize data
You will be working with the latest Web and Mobile technologies: Typescript, Native Script, Ionic, Angular 7, Server-Side Rendering, NodeJS, PWA, Android and IOS.
You will be working on working on native applications
You will Learn, incorporate and utilize the newest technology in furthering the aim of the company and the product
We don’t need superheroes, just super minds
Qualification: BE / B.Tech / MCA / ME / M.Tech
You must have 5+ years of experience in Mobile development
You must have experience on Android, iOS and, JavaScript, React Native, React, Redux
Good to have - NodeJS, GraphQL, SQlite
Optional - Iconic & Angular
We’ve got quite a lot to offer. How about you?
This role is in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries – and the craft of things to come.
We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us craft tomorrow.

Organization: ADVANTA
Company: Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited
Experience Level: Experienced Professional
Job Type: Full-time

Title: Senior Android Developer
Description:
About Testbook –

The fastest rising startup in the EdTech space, Testbook is poised to revolutionize the industry. With a registered user base of over 75 lakh students and a knockout Android App, Testbook has raced to the front and is ideally placed to capture bigger markets.
Testbook is the perfect incubator for talent. You come, you learn, you conquer. You train under the best mentors and become an expert in your field in your own right. That being said, the flexibility in the projects you choose, how and when you work on them, what you want to add to them is respected in this startup. You are the sole master of your work.
But it’s not all about work. Testbook is a family that likes to party, and often. Testbook is where you form bonds for life and connections that last forever. Just like that chacha you can’t shake off on Whatsapp, texting you about the next binge fest.
The IIT pedigree of the co-founders has attracted some of the brightest minds in the country to Testbook. A team that is quickly swelling in ranks and the number is rocketing weekly. Now is the time to join the force.


Key Responsibility

1. Co-ordination with content writers to publish new content & updating of existing content.
2. Basic technical knowledge of Canva, HTML, CSS, and web publishing.
3. Hands-on experience with MS Office (Word/Excel).
4. Experience publishing and managing content across different CMS.
5. Basic knowledge of SEO.

Desired Qualification
Have great communication and writing skills
Have proven ability of a Content writer
Have an aptitude for marketing and branding
Have good analytical skills
Have strong organizational skills and the ability to meet strict deadlines,
Work independently
Are technically sound

Title: Senior Android Developer
Description:
About Testbook –

The fastest rising startup in the EdTech space, Testbook is poised to revolutionize the industry. With a registered user base of over 75 lakh students and a knockout Android App, Testbook has raced to the front and is ideally placed to capture bigger markets.
Testbook is the perfect incubator for talent. You come, you learn, you conquer. You train under the best mentors and become an expert in your field in your own right. That being said, the flexibility in the projects you choose, how and when you work on them, what you want to add to them is respected in this startup. You are the sole master of your work.
But it’s not all about work. Testbook is a family that likes to party, and often. Testbook is where you form bonds for life and connections that last forever. Just like that chacha you can’t shake off on Whatsapp, texting you about the next binge fest.
The IIT pedigree of the co-founders has attracted some of the brightest minds in the country to Testbook. A team that is quickly swelling in ranks and the number is rocketing weekly. Now is the time to join the force.

1. Co-ordination with content writers to publish new content & updating of existing content.
2. Basic technical knowledge of Canva, HTML, CSS, and web publishing.
3. Hands-on experience with MS Office (Word/Excel).
4. Experience publishing and managing content across different CMS.
5. Basic knowledge of SEO.

Desired Qualification
Have great communication and writing skills
Have proven ability of a Content writer
Have an aptitude for marketing and branding
Have good analytical skills
Have strong organizational skills and the ability to meet strict deadlines,
Work independently
Are technically sound

Title: Mobile App Developer
Description:
Job title: Mobile App Developer
With about 4,500 employees, Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited (STS) combines five units: Corporate Technology India, Functional Shared Services, Corporate Finance, Corporate Finance Audit, and Siemens Management Consulting.
Corporate Technology (CT) in India has over 3,000 professionals working in the area of software Research and Development. CT is a part of Siemens Corporate Technology, which is an innovation partner for the Siemens Divisions and shares a point of view in areas of strategic importance to Siemens, thereby ensuring its technological future.
This is your role. What part will you play?
You will be owning customer-facing components, mobile apps, as well as designing the best ways to communicate analytics & visualize data
You will be working with the latest Web and Mobile technologies: Typescript, Native Script, Ionic, Angular 7, Server-Side Rendering, NodeJS, PWA, Android and IOS.
You will be working on working on native applications
You will Learn, incorporate and utilize the newest technology in furthering the aim of the company and the product
We don’t need superheroes, just super minds
Qualification: BE / B.Tech / MCA / ME / M.Tech
You must have 5+ years of experience in Mobile development
You must have experience on Android, iOS and, JavaScript, React Native, React, Redux
Good to have - NodeJS, GraphQL, SQlite
Optional - Iconic & Angular
We’ve got quite a lot to offer. How about you?
This role is in Bangalore, where you’ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries – and the craft of things to come.
We’re Siemens. A collection of over 379,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us craft tomorrow.

Organization: ADVANTA
Company: Siemens Technology and Services Private Limited
Experience Level: Experienced Professional
Job Type: Full-time

Title: Software QA Engineer
Description:
Software QA Engineer
Making the invisible visible. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, we’re advancing the practice of medicine for doctors and society. And we’re just getting warmed up.
AliveCor, the creator of the smartphone ECG, which has now captured over 20 million ECGs from tens of thousands of active users, seeks a SQA Engineer. The Software QA engineer will directly contribute to existing products, testing software for our Web, iOS, and Android products. You will be a key player in developing highly-visible, customer-facing products that are transforming the healthcare industry via big data.

Responsibilities
Be responsible for the testing of all mobile applications.
Report and verify bugs in a timely manner.
Work with developers, product and other team members to develop test plans and cases to mitigate risk.
Document test cases for regulatory purposes.
Promote a culture of quality throughout the organization.
Work with Engineering and Product Management teams to identify high-impact issues.
Use defect tracking tools to log, track and refine issues.
Perform functional testing of new features as they are developed.
Participate in all aspects of QA product lifecycle: understand the product requirements, test case creation, feature, regression, integration, end-to-end test execution.
Prepare and review test plans and cases with extended development and product management teams.

Qualifications and Skills
B.E in Computer Science or a related discipline, or related practical experience.
3-8 years of relevant QA experience.
Proven work experience in Mobile Apps Testing for Android and iOS.
Proven work experience in modern web-based applications testing.
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes.
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing.
Knowledge of automated testing tools will be an added advantage.
Excellent programming skills in one of the following - Ruby, Python, Go, Objective C, or Java

About Us
AliveCor is on a mission to define modern healthcare through data, design and disruption. We’ve pioneered the creation of FDA-cleared machine-learning techniques, transformed wearable medtech to put proactive heart care at everyone’s fingertips. Kardia is the most clinically validated mobile EKG technology. AliveCor was named as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Health for 2017 by Fast Company as part of the publication’s annual ranking of the world’s Most Innovative Companies. AliveCor was awarded the 2015 Tech Pioneer by the World Economic Forum and one of the 50 Smartest Companies in 2015 by the MIT Technology Review. AliveCor recently announced a collaboration with Mayo Clinic that will result in new machine learning capabilities to unlock previously hidden health indicators in EKG data, potentially improving heart health as well as overall health care for a variety of conditions. AliveCor is a privately held company headquartered in Mountain View, CA.
AliveCor is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of age, colour, disability, gender, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation, or any other classification protected by federal, state, or local law.
Watch the following video demonstrating our product.
KardiaMobile: How's your heart?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8I9xosgA-Ig

Title: iOS Mobile App Developer
Description:
Requisition ID: 258004
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time

COMPANY DESCRIPTION

SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
Ariba, an SAP company, is the world’s business commerce network. We help companies extend their business commerce processes into the Cloud, where they can use our Procurement solutions and the Ariba Network to find opportunities to cut costs, reduce risk, and grow revenue through better collaboration with trading partners. The Ariba Network is the world’s largest trading partner community with more than $600B of commerce flowing through and more than 1.7 million businesses in 190 countries around the world, with a new business joining Ariba Network every two minutes. Together with SAP, we are combining the best of both companies to fuel a whole new way of doing business in today's digital economy.
Curious? Take a peek into Ariba products: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeaUEBvH5UU
The Role
Deliver across the entire app life cycle –concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores and support
Working directly with developers and product managers to conceptualize, build, test and realize products
Gather requirements around functionality and translate those requirements into elegant functional solutions
Build prototypes at tech scoping stage of projects
Working along the web developers to create and maintain a robust framework to support the app and working with the front end developers to build the interface with focus on usability features
Create compelling device specific user interfaces and experiences
Standardizing the platform and in some cases apps to deliver across multiple brands with minimal duplication of effort and optimizing performance for the apps
Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies
Explain technologies and solutions to technical and non-technical stakeholders
Role Requirements
Bachelor's in computer science or equivalent work experience
3 to 5+ years of development experience developing production grade software
Proven commercial software development experience – desktop and mobile
Published examples of mobile applications on the App store or the Android market
Excellent knowledge in information architecture, human computer interaction and usability design principles
Ability to multi task and good time management skills
Preferred Qualifications
Strong OO design and programming skills in Swift
Familiar with iOS SDK (UI Kit, Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Core Location, etc) and experience building web and native apps
Familiar with xCode
Experience integrating with RESTful API backends
Good understanding of OO programming and design patterns Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and database queries
Using version control (e.g. Git)
Excellent debugging and optimization skills
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
Additional Locations:

About the company:
TelePe is a brand of Priest International Services Private Limited, TelePe is an instant personal loan platform for young professionals, where they can avail loan (up to 5 lakh) as per their requirement and profile to profile. The process is 100% online, and the amount is disbursed directly into the bank account of the users by support from banks & Nbfc's. We just created the database and close the all data with the support of banks to banks only. With a strong focus on online tech-based and data-centric KYC, TelePe envisions to solve the financial inclusion gap in the varied demographic segments of the country. TelePe is starting a young platform for the users where they can apply any kind of loan services. Title: iOS Mobile App Developer
Description:
Requisition ID: 258004
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional

COMPANY DESCRIPTION

SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
Ariba, an SAP company, is the world’s business commerce network. We help companies extend their business commerce processes into the Cloud, where they can use our Procurement solutions and the Ariba Network to find opportunities to cut costs, reduce risk, and grow revenue through better collaboration with trading partners. The Ariba Network is the world’s largest trading partner community with more than $600B of commerce flowing through and more than 1.7 million businesses in 190 countries around the world, with a new business joining Ariba Network every two minutes. Together with SAP, we are combining the best of both companies to fuel a whole new way of doing business in today's digital economy.
Curious? Take a peek into Ariba products: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeaUEBvH5UU
The Role
Deliver across the entire app life cycle –concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores and support
Working directly with developers and product managers to conceptualize, build, test and realize products
Gather requirements around functionality and translate those requirements into elegant functional solutions
Build prototypes at tech scoping stage of projects
Working along the web developers to create and maintain a robust framework to support the app and working with the front end developers to build the interface with focus on usability features
Create compelling device specific user interfaces and experiences
Standardizing the platform and in some cases apps to deliver across multiple brands with minimal duplication of effort and optimizing performance for the apps
Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies
Explain technologies and solutions to technical and non-technical stakeholders
Role Requirements
Bachelor's in computer science or equivalent work experience
3 to 5+ years of development experience developing production grade software
Proven commercial software development experience – desktop and mobile
Published examples of mobile applications on the App store or the Android market
Excellent knowledge in information architecture, human computer interaction and usability design principles
Ability to multi task and good time management skills
Preferred Qualifications
Strong OO design and programming skills in Swift
Familiar with iOS SDK (UI Kit, Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Core Location, etc) and experience building web and native apps
Familiar with xCode
Experience integrating with RESTful API backends
Good understanding of OO programming and design patterns Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and database queries
Using version control (e.g. Git)
Excellent debugging and optimization skills
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer I
Description:
1+ year of experience working as a Quality Assurance Engineer
Experience in manual testing
Experience in automation testing
Bachelor's Degree
Experience in manual testing and automation testing
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field or equivalent work experience.
3+ years of test engineering experience.
Understanding of QA processes and concepts including test plan, test case preparation, and testing methodologies, agile a plus.
Demonstrated knowledge of professional software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control, build and release processes, continuous deployment, and test suite development and maintenance.
Define test plans, test suites, test cases as well as utilize automated tools to optimize the STLC.
Experience in Core Java, Python, JavaScript scripting and user-level test automation.
Hands-on experience with automated testing tools like Selenium, Appium for android and iOS.

Amazon's Ring is looking for is looking for high-energy, detail-oriented, and technically-savvy Quality Assurance Engineers to perform quality assurance testing. QAEs at Amazon are excellent individual contributors capable of understanding business requirements and converting them to QA understandable testcases, driving test execution, capturing errors and automating those test cases. QAEs would be trying to understand application performance, functionality, features to great depth which would enable them to report issues and also take ownership in automating the repetitive tasks. QAEs are highly accurate in performing application tests, reporting the behavior ensuring that there is no ambiguity while reproducing issues. High quality and accuracy is maintained throughout the application release without compromising on deadlines.

Role Responsibilities:
As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will:
Work closely with engineers and business owners throughout the development and testing life cycle, review requirements, specifications and technical design documents
Drive the creation of test plans and test cases, efficiently execute test cases across all functional and UI areas of our products
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools
Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs
Collaborate with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
Monitor debugging process results

About Ring
Since its founding in 2013, Ring has been on a mission to make neighborhoods safer. From the video doorbell, to Ring Alarm, which was named #1 in Customer Satisfaction for DIY Home Security Systems by J.D. Power, Ring’s smart home security product line, as well as the Neighbors app, offer users affordable whole-home and neighborhood security. At Ring, we are committed to making home and neighborhood security accessible and effective for everyone - while working hard to bring communities together. Ring is an Amazon company. For more information, visit www.ring.com. With Ring, you’re always home.
Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please visit https://www.amazon.jobs/en/disability/us//.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills, especially excellence in technical communications with peers who may be remote.
Good knowledge of software QA methodologies, automation tools and processes
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
Shows creativity and initiative to improve product test coverage and effectiveness.
Experience working in an agile/scrum development process
Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus

Description:

If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet you.

14. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

16. Design, build and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
17. Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
18. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
19. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
20. Experience consuming and/or designing REST APIs
21. Developing android mobile application by understanding the requirements given by clients.
22. Understanding the requirement specification for the product
23. Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform.
24. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
25. Developing, releasing, and maintaining Android Applications Required Experience, Skills and
Qualifications:

2. Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Play Store
3. In-depth knowledge of Java/Kotlin
4. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
5. Familiarity with OOP design principles
6. Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
7. Ability to perform in a team environment
8. BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
9. Skills - Android, Android Studio, SDK, Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes, Kotlin.

Title: Mobile App Development Internship
Description:
About the company:
Yourdrop Private Limited is an essential services provider that is covering a large customer base and are serving them from our associated retail business holders. Yourdrop provides its services in delivering daily needs and other essential commodities at customers' doorstep.
About the internship/job:
We are looking for a strong mobile app developer who welcomes both engineering and maintenance tasks. The primary focus will be to implement new user interfaces and features together with automated unit and integration tests. Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Developing new features and user interfaces from wireframe models 2. Ensuring the best performance and user experience of the application 3. Fixing bugs and performance problems 4. Writing clean, readable, and testable code 5. Cooperating with back-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team to deliver well-architected and high-quality solutions You will be working with our candid and collaborative team, where your knowledge and advice about application architecture and the newest mobile technologies will be highly appreciated. The code you write will need to be cleanly organized and of the highest quality. You'll also help ensure solid application performance and excellent user experience.
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for full time (in-office) internship
have relevant skills and interests
can start the internship between 14th Jul'20 and 18th Aug'20
are available for duration of 6 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Other requirements:
Extensive knowledge of mobile app development (this includes the whole process, from the first line of code to publishing in the store(s)) Deep knowledge of Android and iOS Familiarity with the JSON format, Git, and push notifications Experience with profiling and debugging mobile applications Ability to create mobile applications in various platforms in React Native along with integrating APIs connectivity and data management
Number of internships/jobs available: 1
Categories: Mobile App Development,Computer Science,Engineering

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
Description:
Get to know our Team:

When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on millions of lives on a daily basis. Our team is empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve millions of passengers, driving partners, and fellow grabbers.

Get to know the Role:
Responsible for e2e test and release of new features with the best quality possible.
Understand the product/feature in-depth from end-user point of view and also the underlying implementation.
Working closely with the Product Manager, Front End, and Backend developers to understand the feature and the implementation to derive and execute feature tests and impacted feature test cases.
Debug failed test cases by analyzing logs and API responses and report bugs with details. Follow-up on bugs to closure.
Execute & maintain UI (Web, Mobile app) and API automation suites. Debug and correct script and data issues in automation suites.
Understand automation framework and add automation test cases for the new features and regression test cases

The must-haves:
Bachelor in Computer Science or Equivalent Degree with at least 2 years of relevant working experience a QA Engineer/ Tester.
Hands-on experience in testing Android, iOS Mobile apps and APIs preferably.
Should be able to Requirement docs and derive test cases for new features along with impacted features.
Should have a deeper understanding of the product at the implementation level, should be able to analyze logs and API responses in the Micro-Service integration level.
Should have exposure to Agile and weekly sprint and release working models.
Should have coding experience and hands-on with automation (Web, Mobile app and API automation)
Knowledge of Tools: Charles, Postman, UI Automation Tools(Selenium, Appium, etc..), Testing Frameworks (Mocha, TestNG, etc.. ), Languages (Any OOPs language, TypeScript, Go, Java, etc..)
Excellent communication skills
Team player who endorses collaborative work style

Title: Lead Mobile Developer
Description:
We’re constantly looking for bright young professionals to join our team to help us create a better loan experience for businesses all across India. If you fit the bill, come join us today!
Job Description - Android Applications Developer
We are seeking an enthusiastic B.Tech/BE/MCA/M.Sc – Computers, candidate. Must work well in a team environment and have an innovative approach. The senior mobile developer will be a core member of our technology team and be responsible for building multiple mobile world-class apps for the Namaste Credit marketplace. These apps (Android and IOS) will allow our Sales, Lenders and Borrowers to use the mobile application to interact with our platform – providing inputs and getting a range of status updates on their account. The mobile developer will interface with our server team and keep the mobile application in synch with changes on the Web Portal and Marketplace and will be responsible for keeping the releases up-to-date with the latest OS releases (Android or IOS). Finally, the mobile developer should be able to support the sales team for any queries from clients on the mobile application.
Experience:
Perform upgrades and maintenance while modifying existing software to improve performance, correct errors and allow adaptation to new hardware
Recommend software upgrades for clients’ programs and systems if necessary, and analyze software requirements and user needs to determine whether the system design is feasible and can be completed within time and budget constraints
Collaborate with engineers, programmers, systems analysts and others on projects, and gather information on project capabilities and limitations, interface and performance requirements to create optimum software
Design, develop and modify software systems, using mathematical models and scientific analysis to predict and measure possible outcomes
Store, retrieve and manipulate data to understand system capabilities and requirements
Direct software system testing, validation procedures, application and system documentation and programming to ensure normal program functioning
Manage the work of technologists, programmers, technicians and other related team members, and provide instruction on writing software code as needed
Coordinate software installation and monitor equipment to confirm specifications have been met
Desired Skills and Experience:
Strong OO design and programming skills in Java (J2EE/ J2ME)
Demonstrable knowledge of iOS (Objective-C or Swift) development
Familiar with the Android SDK
Experience with iOS frameworks
Knowledge of SQLite, MySQL or similar database management system
Familiar with Android Studio
Common Understanding of other compiled languages
Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML)
Experienced in MVC OR MVC Architecture
Experienced in Kotlin and dagger.
Experience of development using web technologies
Good understanding of OO programming and design patterns
Experience building native apps
Experience using social media APIs
Using version control (e.g. SVN)
Excellent debugging and optimisation skills
9-12 yrs of experience

Title: Sr. Android Developer
Description:
We are looking for a qualified Android developer to join our app development team. You will be working with our engineers/ developers to develop and maintain high quality mobile application features. If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet you.
As a Sr. Android developer, you’ll collaborate with internal teams to develop functional mobile applications, while working in a fast-paced environment. Ultimately, you should be able to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.
What we are looking for:
Knowledge of Firebase, RealmDB
Knowledge of MVP / MVVM
Knowledge of Kotlin is good to have
Sound knowledge of Android Activity life-cycle and different applications.
Responsibilities:
1. Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
2. Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
3. Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions
4. Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
5. Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
6. Design interfaces to improve user experience
7. Liaise with Product development team to plan new features

13. Improving application performance, optimization for loading times
14. Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
15. Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services.
16. Design, build and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
17. Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
18. Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
19. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
20. Experience consuming and/or designing REST APIs
21. Developing android mobile application by understanding the requirements given by clients.
22. Understanding the requirement specification for the product
23. Building and Designing advanced Android applications for Android platform.
24. Cross-functional team collaboration to design, define and ship new features
25. Developing, releasing, and maintaining Android Applications Required Experience, Skills and
Qualifications:
1. Proven work experience as a Mobile developer
2. Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App store or the Play Store
3. In-depth knowledge of Java/Kotlin
4. Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
5. Familiarity with OOP design principles
6. Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
7. Ability to perform in a team environment
8. BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
9. Skills - Android, Android Studio, SDK, Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes, Kotlin.

Troubleshooting application and code issues.

*

Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
Description:
Get to know our Team:

When you're an engineer at Grab, you are part of the heart and soul of the company. Our passion is anchored in the work that we do, and this is reflected in the impact we make on millions of lives on a daily basis. Our team is empowered by creating amazing services and tools that serve millions of passengers, driving partners, and fellow grabbers.

Get to know the Role:
Responsible for e2e test and release of new features with the best quality possible.
Understand the product/feature in-depth from end-user point of view and also the underlying implementation.
Working closely with the Product Manager, Front End, and Backend developers to understand the feature and the implementation to derive and execute feature tests and impacted feature test cases.
Debug failed test cases by analyzing logs and API responses and report bugs with details. Follow-up on bugs to closure.
Execute & maintain UI (Web, Mobile app) and API automation suites. Debug and correct script and data issues in automation suites.
Understand automation framework and add automation test cases for the new features and regression test cases

The must-haves:
Bachelor in Computer Science or Equivalent Degree with at least 2 years of relevant working experience a QA Engineer/ Tester.
Hands-on experience in testing Android, iOS Mobile apps and APIs preferably.
Should be able to Requirement docs and derive test cases for new features along with impacted features.
Should have a deeper understanding of the product at the implementation level, should be able to analyze logs and API responses in the Micro-Service integration level.
Should have exposure to Agile and weekly sprint and release working models.
Should have coding experience and hands-on with automation (Web, Mobile app and API automation)
Knowledge of Tools: Charles, Postman, UI Automation Tools(Selenium, Appium, etc..), Testing Frameworks (Mocha, TestNG, etc.. ), Languages (Any OOPs language, TypeScript, Go, Java, etc..)
Excellent communication skills
Team player who endorses collaborative work style

Company Profile
Astroved.com Pvt Ltd
Astroved is a fast-growing consumer internet company focused on bringing Vedic Astrological content and services to consumers worldwide. We incorporate ancient wisdom into modern applications to improve our customers’ lives. Offerings include a wide range of predictive services in the areas of health, wealth/finance, career, relationship and other life matters, as well as a full array of traditional remedial services.
We aim to transform our members’ lives by developing top tier, scientifically validated astrology and Vedic-based services and applications to address the problems with which one struggles. Key to this is establishing research and development initiatives and building B2B partnerships and alliances with synergistic institutions.
Founded in 2001 by visionary founder Dr. Baskaran Pillai, Astroved has a strong team with domain expertise in the astrology arena, a talented technical staff and management presence in both the U.S. and India.
With loyal customers in U.S., Europe, Asia and India, Astroved has already attained global market presence. Astroved has an active list of over 200,000 customers worldwide and access to over 3M engaged consumers through Dr. Pillai’s presence on YouTube and other media.
Unlike many internet-based astrology companies, Astroved is already profitable and generating cash. Poised for next phase of growth.

“Stay home,stay safe” Initiative taken by Vyomlabs

Opportunity to showcase your talent.
winning team will get an Internship completion letter.
Good platform.

Title: Mobile App Development Internship
Description:
About the company:
We Are Crazy is a non-profit educational organization that teaches personal development and leadership skills through a worldwide network of clubs. We help people from diverse backgrounds become more confident speakers, communicators, and leaders. Our foundation is promoting education and helping out our nation to beat the economic crisis caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.
About the internship/job:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform 2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features 3. Work on unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability 4. Work on bug fixing and improving application performance 5. Discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency 6. Work with outside data sources and APIs
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for full time (in-office) internship
have relevant skills and interests
can start the internship between 14th Jul'20 and 18th Aug'20
are available for duration of 4 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
are from Bhubaneswar, Chennai, Delhi, Gurgaon, Kolkata, Lucknow, Thiruvananthapuram, Bangalore, Mumbai, Jaipur, Noida and neighboring cities
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 5
Categories: Mobile App Development,NGO,Computer Science,Engineering,Volunteering
